project.title: ALARAD: Smart Farm Platform for high-quality and traceable yield.
project.description: A multi-purpose DDS based on proximal and remote sensing

project.title: Smart Farming: Precision Agriculture using IoT
project.description: This project focuses on developing a precision agriculture system that uses IoT (Internet of Things) technology to provide farmers with real-time data on soil moisture, temperature, humidity, and other key metrics. This information can then be used to optimize crop yields, reduce water usage, and improve overall farm efficiency.

content.title: Application of Artificial Intelligence in Phenomics
